item.title: Political turmoil and eurozone gloom suggest third ECB rate cut incoming
item.description: The European Central Bank will seek a careful balance with its latest cut, wary of inflation, politics, and trade turbulence.

item.title: New Jersey to consider charging oil and gas producers fees to fight climate change
item.description: The proposal aims to create a Climate Superfund similar to those created by the federal government to clean up toxic waste.

item.title: New Jersey bill targeting plastic packaging would require it to be recyclable or compostable by 2034
item.description: From bubble wrap to puffy air-filled plastic pockets, lots of what keeps items safe during shipping often ends up in landfills.

item.title: Ontario premier says energy supplies to the US will be cut off if Trump imposes tariffs on Canada
item.description: “We will use every tool in our tool box to fight back," says Ontario Premier Doug Ford.

item.title: Biden administration will hike tariffs on imports of Chinese solar wafers, polysilicon and tungsten products
item.description: “The tariff increases announced today will further blunt the harmful policies and practices by the People’s Republic of China," USTR Katharine Tai sai...
